events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request related to order return and money back.
Your request has been assigned to our returns specialist to assist you further.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your return request. Could you please provide the order number and reason for return?
To process the refund quickly, please share the order number and confirm whether the item is unused and undamaged.
The order number is 5489763. The jacket is brand new, I just tried it on once and decided it’s too small.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. We will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Great, thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label offer. Looking forward to receiving it.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to see if you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us.
